title: Sri Lanka's burning cargo ship on track to become its 'worst environmental disaster'
content:
1. Sri Lanka's burning cargo ship on track to become its 'worst environmental disaster'  CNN
  2. Microplastics and debris from burning ship washes onto Sri Lankan coast  South China Morning Post
  3. A burning ship covered beautiful beaches in plastic ‘snow.’ Now Sri Lanka faces an environmental disaster.  The Washington Post
  4. Sri Lanka facing its 'worst beach pollution' from burning ship  adaderana.lk
  5. Sri Lanka faces environmental disaster as cargo ship burns for days  Guardian News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
